channel.title: REPL Querying
channel.description:
It might be worthwhile to take some inspiration from this:
https://github.com/ellie/atuin
I'd like us to start using the [persistence features](https://github.com/hostilefork/replpad-js/blob/master/storage.md) to remember previous sessions, and perhaps make it easier to **curate past Repl interactions into scripts**.
